title: First test question for zone Nord
question:
This is the first example question.

Text could be multiline and have **some _formatting_**.

question-i18n.question:
See on esimene näide küsimusest.

Teksti saab _vormindada_ **mitmerealisena**.

answers:
X First wrong answer
X Second wrong answer
V First good answer
X Last wrong answer

answer-i18n.answers:
X Esimene vale vastus
X Teine vale vastus
V Esimene õige vastus
X Viimane vale vastus
